titles.title: To authorize the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Azerbaijan.
To authorize the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Azerbaijan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Authorizes the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Azerbaijan.
